title: Banned for the wrong reason.
body: So I have had two accounts banned in the same day for flaming. YES, I understand I should not be flaming at people, that is wrong, but if someone is saying "fuck y'all i'm afk" or "i'm int'ing" when I haven't said I god damn thing, WHY DO THEY NOT GET BANNED BUT I DO?! I wouldn't be flaming in the first place if they would just grow up and play the god damn game! This banning system is biased and retarded. It seeks out that you've used bad words, bans you, then goes on its merry way. How about watch the god damn games and see that there is a reason behind it?! What happens if I'm provoked? THEY get off scott free and I get banned. It's so fucking unfair!

replies.body:
If you */mute all* and don't talk at all and play to win, there is literally no reason for Riot to ban you.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

If I have people running into my lane feeding, what the fuck am I meant to do? They abuse me and I defend myself. yet I get banned and they don't. It's complete garbage. We need the tribunal back so it can deliver FAIR punishments.
